(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (RB still))
    (VP (VB remember)
      (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ last) (NN post))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NN President) (POS 's))
          (NNP Teh) (NNP Tarik))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD thought)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (MD would)
            (ADVP (RB never))
            (VP (VB have)
              (NP (DT a) (NN chance)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB drink)
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT the) (NNP Presidential) (NNP Brew))
                            (PP (IN since)
                              (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (NNP Michael) (NNP Bolton) ('' ''))))
                          (CC and)
                          (NP
                            (NP
                              (NP (PRP I))
                              (NP (DT both) (NN share)))
                            (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (JJ working) (NNS shifts))))))))))))))
    (. .)))
